about_the_game:
Are You Ready to Build Your Own E-Commerce Empire?

Top Sellers offers an in-depth trade simulation that invites you to the heart of the real-world e-commerce landscape. Starting from scratch, you’ll strive to transform your small business into a giant brand with strategic moves and creative solutions. Critical decisions such as product selection, inventory management, customer satisfaction, and expanding into global markets will shape your journey at every step. The road to success is challenging, but reaching the top is worth it all!

What Awaits You in Top Sellers?

🏢 Warehouse Management
Organize your products efficiently and keep your inventory under control to quickly prepare orders. By expanding your warehouse and stocking more products, you can meet high customer demand instantly. Effective warehouse management is the key to growth!

🛒 Wholesale Stores
Discover profitable product opportunities by exploring wholesale stores. Impress your customers with a wide range of products that exceed expectations! Each selection shapes your store's character and strategy.

🚁 Drone City Delivery
Deliver orders quickly and efficiently using modern drone technology.

📱 Remote Management with Tablets
Easily monitor your warehouses and inventories from anywhere with your tablet.

📡 Warehouse Management with RFID
Track and manage warehouse products effortlessly using RFID readers.

🏷 Labeling Systems

  • Pallet Labeling: Easily determine which pallet to place your products on.

  • Vehicle Labeling: Show your courier which products to load into their vehicle.

🏆 Competitive Leaderboard
We’ll bring the excitement to new heights with a leaderboard that boosts competition in the marketplace!

😊 Customer Satisfaction
Earn customer trust by delivering orders on time. Customer satisfaction is the most powerful way to grow your business and build brand loyalty.

🚚 Logistics and Cargo Management
Package the right products and ship them on time. Expand your business to global markets and experience the thrill of international trade!

🚚 Automatic Delivery
Your trade manager can directly deliver products from wholesalers to your warehouse. This allows you to focus on strategies!

🛠️ Second-Hand Market
Discover second-hand markets for high profits, buy products at advantageous prices, and resell them at much higher prices to multiply your earnings. Use smart strategies to grow your business in the second-hand market!

💼 Offer-Based Purchasing System
Make strategic moves with an offer-based purchasing system for second-hand products and enhance your bargaining power! Secure great opportunities to take your business to the next level.

👥 New Employees
Hire the right talents to grow your business. A strong team is the cornerstone of your e-commerce empire. With dedicated employees, take your store to new heights!

⚡ Fast Delivery Options
Use your local distribution network to deliver orders to customers on time. Fast delivery increases customer satisfaction and helps you stand out from the competition. Every on-time delivery takes you a step ahead!

🌍 Global Trade Management
Manage overseas delivery processes as you expand your business to global markets. Track the cargo ship arriving at regular intervals and complete your orders on time to achieve international success!

💰 Tax and Rent Management
Ensure smooth business operations by paying taxes and rents on time. Avoid delays and penalties to maintain your store's financial health.

🎉 Every Successful Sale Moves Your Business Forward
Level up your store to access more suppliers and expand your product variety. Increase your warehouse capacity, build a strong team, and provide exceptional service to boost your store rating.

🕹 Steam Deck Support
Top Sellers is playable on Steam Deck!

PROGRESS AND GROWTH
Upgrade your warehouse to access a wider range of products from new wholesalers and expand your product selection. Grow your warehouse space to stock more items and sustain the flow of orders. Remember, more orders mean more revenue.
As your business grows, hire new employees to strengthen your team. Deliver excellent service to boost your store rating. As your rating increases, you’ll receive more orders and climb the Top Sellers leaderboard. Collect badges and progress on your journey to becoming the king of e-commerce!

Exciting Features Coming Soon!
Get ready for a richer experience in Top Sellers! In addition to the features you’ve enjoyed so far, here’s what you can look forward to:

🚉 Train and Airport
We’ll activate trains and airports to bring you new surprises!

🔌 Electric Vehicles
Transform your vehicle into an eco-friendly electric vehicle! Manage charging and maintenance needs to make your business more sustainable.

📅 Special Day Campaign Systems
Offer unforgettable gifts to your customers with special products for occasions like New Year’s, Halloween, and Valentine’s Day. Increase engagement and sales with targeted promotions.

🏦 Banking and Credit Systems
Implement banking and credit systems to manage your finances more effectively and boost profitability as your business grows.

🛠️ Product Repair System
Repair second-hand products you bought at advantageous prices and sell them at high prices to secure great profits.

🏷️ Seasonal Product System
Optimize your sales potential with seasonal products like summer and winter collections, and diversify your store with items tailored to each season.

🛰️ GPS for Fast Delivery
Track delivery boxes in your vehicles in real-time with GPS. Stay ahead in fast delivery.

🏋️ Pallet Loading System
Easily transport fully loaded pallets to speed up your business processes.

🏠 Home Buying and Decoration System
Use your store’s earnings to purchase and decorate your home.

📊 Detailed Statistics and Analysis
Examine all the data about your business with detailed analytics and refine your strategy.

And much more…

Prepare for a unique e-commerce experience as we bring these exciting features to life in Top Sellers! Your journey to becoming an e-commerce giant is just beginning—stay tuned!

name: Top Sellers - Ecommerce Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Are you ready to start your own e-commerce business and grow globally? Explore wholesale stores, select your products, manage your warehouse, and prepare and deliver your orders flawlessly. Join an adventure filled with opportunities in this highly competitive world!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish, Arabic, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
